findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The distributeTokens function only checks whether total supply is less than or equal to distributed tokens, but doesn't subtract from minted tokens, allowing the owner to distribute tokens more than total supply.

findings.title: Distribute tokens more than token supply should be failed
findings.description: The distributeTokens function only checks if total supply is less than or equal to distributed tokens but doesn't subtract from minted tokens, allowing owners to distribute more tokens than the total supply.

findings.title: Burn tokens(Failed when try to burn tokens that account have, because total supply is less then account holders token)
findings.description: Failed to burn tokens due to total supply being less than the account holder's tokens

findings.title: Burn tokens (No transfer event when tokens burn)
findings.description: The burn function does not emit a transfer event, causing Etherscan to incorrectly display account balances.
